instructions: Participants rated their own comfort and estimated the average student's comfort with campus alcohol habits, including an estimate of the interquartile range of the student body.

items.question: How comfortable do you feel with the alcohol drinking habits of students at Princeton?

metadata.original_scale: 11-point scale (1 = not at all comfortable, 11 = very comfortable)

items.question: How comfortable does the average Princeton undergraduate feel with the alcohol drinking habits of students at Princeton?

metadata.original_scale: 11-point scale (1 = not at all comfortable, 11 = very comfortable). Participants were also asked to 'circle the average student's response and then bracket the two values between which the attitudes of 50% of students fall.'
